content.rendered:
All students get 100% satisfaction after completion of training. They are more than happy because of perfect course deliver and practical training. We offer placement assistance to our students. Our past students got jobs in many startups, MNC and abroad also.

All students always be in touch with us. If thy need to join any more course they join I-Tech Sytsem only. They also suggest to join course at Vmaxinfo Instituteto their friends and relatives.

Below are review from some of our students.

Best computer class ever!!! I will never go anywhere else. Classes are awesome and so are the staff. Equipment is best. I-tech is not about getting numbers through the doors they are there to focus on you!! I-tech offers quality training!!

Gaurav Singhania

I-tech is absolutely amazing class.I would recommend it to all my friends and family. I-tech knows all the tips and tricks; has a kind and supportive instructors . The best part is that they offer 1 to 1 coaching which ensures best learning.

kunal Holkar

Excellence, attention to detail and timely delivery in work. Will surly work with them again!

Nitin Borale


Just completed Android Development Course.
Teaching Faculty is Excellent.
The atmosphere is good.
Fully Satisfied.
If You Want to Do Any IT Course, Go For Vmaxinfo Institutes…

Pavan Metkar


Well experience staff and easily clear all concepts about software testing course and all equipment are available for practice and one of the best institute in pune

Rohan kapadnis

It is one of the best institute in nasik, It was great experience with Itech, Great,supportive and knowlegable Teaching faculty. Great place to learn software Testing.

Mayuri Beldar


It is very good institution.
Personal attention is given to each student.
Very good teaching provided.

manisha yerandekar
